title: John Bradley from Dads
itunes:title: John Bradley from Dads
description:
One afternoon in Los Angeles, on the eve of their biggest tour to date, I met up with the drummer of the rock band Dads, John Bradley . Little did I know this conversation would be my most unscripted and off the cuff episode in the history of the podcast. We discussed controlling relationships, dealing with adversity and controlled humor. It's a chat that absolutely everyone should listen to. Brought to you in conjunction with Propertyofzack.comPlease donate to the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
